sect1.title: Build Flags
sect1.para: We will need to setup target specific flags for the compiler and linkers.

screen.userinput: export BUILD32="-mabi=32 -mips64" export BUILDN32="-mabi=n32 -mips64" export BUILD64="-mabi=64 -mips64"
